record.title: DISCHARGE AND REFERRAL--S.J. RES. 17
record.narrative:
DISCHARGE AND REFERRAL--S.J. RES. 17 -- (Senate - September 05, 2007)

[Page: S11125]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Foreign Relations be discharged from further consideration of S.J. Res. 17 and the joint resolution be referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science and Transportation.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
